responses: Mujhe ye batate huye bahut dukh ho rahi hai ki mujhe abhin kewal 2 bhasa aati hai Hindi aur English. Abhi main Developing phase mein hun. Bhavisya mein mujhe anya bhasaon par train kiya ja sakta hain jaise ki Maithili etc.

Dekhiye Bhasa ek sanchar ka madhyam hai jiske dwara hum ek dusre se baat kar paate hain aapni bhwana ek dusre se share karte hain. Lekin is samya tak main kewal Hindi aur English mein baat kar sakta hun. Aane wale time mein Maithili jaisi bhasawon per train kiya ja sakta hai. Abhi mein ek developing phase mein hun.
Main aapki bhwana ko samjh sakta hun. Lekin main ek Machine hun, Abhi mere under koi feeling aur emotions nahi hai.
